colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(ZHES PHYAG RDOR DRAG PO GSUM BSGRIL GYI RJES GNANG 'DI NI, CHOS LA MKHYEN PA'I SPYAN YANGS SHING BSTAN 'GROR PHAN PA'I LHAG BSAM BZOR CING, NYAMS RTOGS KHYAD PAR GYIS THUGS RGYUD PHYUG PA'I CHOS RJE CHOS DON GRUB ZHES BYA BAS BSKUL BA LTAR, ^BLO LHUN MING CAN GYIS SBYAR BA'O, ,)
